title: exosomes derived from lung cancer cell A549
source_name_ch1: exosomes from DDP sensitive A549 lung cancer cells
characteristics_ch1: phenotype: cancer cells sensitive to DDP
treatment_protocol_ch1: Exosome-depleted FBS was used to avoid the impact of exosomes. FBS was depleted of exosomes by ultracentrifugation at 1×106g at 4°C for 16h (Beckman Coulter Avanti J-30I, USA). After being incubated for 48-72h, the culture medium was harvested and isolated by ultracentrifugation. Briefly, cell culture medium was sequentially centrifuged at 300g for 10min, 2,000g for 15min, and 12,000g for 30min to remove floating cells and cellular debris. These were then passed through a 0.22μm filter. The supernatant was further ultracentrifuged at 1×106 g for 2h at 4°C, washed in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS), and submitted to a second ultracentrifugation in the same conditions. The final exosome pellets were used immediately or resuspended in 100μl of PBS and stored at −80°C for further analysis.
extract_protocol_ch1: RNA was isolated using the Total RNA Purification Kit  (Norgen, Cat. 17200) according to the manufacturer's instructions from 200 μL of frozen exosome in PBS. The volume of the obtained RNA solution was 30 μL.
label_protocol_ch1: Cyanine-3 (Cy3) labeled RNA was prepared from 30μl concentrated exosomal RNA using the Agilent miRNA Complete Labeling and Hyb Kit (#5190-0456, Agilent) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
hyb_protocol: Dry  the labeled RNA with vacuum concentrator. Assemble Hybridization mixture with Hyb Spike-In according to the manufacturer's instructions  (#5190-0456, Agilent). Hybridization mixture hybridized to Agilent microRNA array (G4872A) for 20 hours at 55°C in a rotating Agilent hybridization oven. After hybridization, microarrays were washed with Wash Buffer 1 (Agilent) and Wash buffer 2 (Agilent), then dried immediately by brief centrifugation.
scan_protocol: Slides were scanned immediately after washing on the Agilent DNA Microarray Scanner (G2505C) using one color scan setting for array slides (Scan Area 61x21.6 mm, Scan resolution 5um, Dye channel is set to Green and Green PMT is set to 100%).
description: miRNA expression of exosomes derived from A549 cells
data_processing: The scanned images were analyzed with Feature Extraction Software 10.10.1.1 (Agilent) using default parameters (protocol GE1-v1_91 and Grid: 046064_D_F_20121223) to obtain background subtracted and spatially detrended Processed Signal intensities.  Features flagged in Feature Extraction as Feature Non-uniform outliers were excluded.

title: exosomes derived from cisplatin (DDP) resistant A549/DDP lung cancer cells
